body:
I 'd like to become more active.

Is it being on the teamspeak, getting skypes, ect? OR just saying hi?

Whatever it is, I'd like to become more active! So help a brother out, what do I do?
body_tagged:
I 'd like to become more active.

Is it being on the teamspeak, getting skypes, ect? OR just saying hi?

Whatever it is, I'd like to become more active! So help a brother out, what do I do?
title: How can I make more friends in the community?

replies.body: Forums, Skype, Teamspeak, friendly talking, dont break rules,
replies.body_tagged: Forums, Skype, Teamspeak, friendly talking, dont break rules,

replies.body: https://avicus.net/forums/abafe4fe7
replies.body_tagged: https://avicus.net/forums/abafe4fe7

replies.body: When I wasn't very popular in the community, I started out by posting more on the forums. In game, I would greet many people. Over time, many people knew who I was and I became more popular. Also, I highly recommend TeamSpeak. :)
replies.body_tagged: When I wasn't very popular in the community, I started out by posting more on the forums. In game, I would greet many people. Over time, many people knew who I was and I became more popular. Also, I highly recommend TeamSpeak. :)

replies.body: I spent like 30 minutes adding like 150 people on the forums
replies.body_tagged: I spent like 30 minutes adding like 150 people on the forums

replies.body: I started to become active on the server once I joined the Avicus Teamspeak! There are some really nice and funny users on there that are always open to meet new people! As well as what Pete said, greet some players in game and be open to having a conversation with players you don't even know, they may end up being good friend of yours! :P
replies.body_tagged: I started to become active on the server once I joined the Avicus Teamspeak! There are some really nice and funny users on there that are always open to meet new people! As well as what Pete said, greet some players in game and be open to having a conversation with players you don't even know, they may end up being good friend of yours! :P

replies.body: Send friend requests to random people
replies.body_tagged: Send friend requests to random people

replies.body: Oh so I'm random now.. xd
replies.body_tagged: Oh so I'm random now.. xd

reply_to.body: Send friend requests to random people
reply_to.body_tagged: Send friend requests to random people

replies.body: I HIGHLY recommend TeamSpeak! It is a great way to meet new people and find other players that share similar interests with you! I would also try to get on a team, because The Tournament is coming up soon, and anyone who is anyone will join :D
replies.body_tagged: I HIGHLY recommend TeamSpeak! It is a great way to meet new people and find other players that share similar interests with you! I would also try to get on a team, because The Tournament is coming up soon, and anyone who is anyone will join :D

replies.body: You already made one :DDDDD
replies.body_tagged: You already made one :DDDDD

replies.body: Talk to people on the forums, go into TeamSpeak, and don't break the rules and you will have friends! You can also apply for livestreamer if you can livestream for events! This will be a good way to meet new people!
replies.body_tagged: Talk to people on the forums, go into TeamSpeak, and don't break the rules and you will have friends! You can also apply for livestreamer if you can livestream for events! This will be a good way to meet new people!

replies.body: When I wasn't very popular in the community, I became a developer.  Instant friendship points.  But seriously, I'd just keep active and you'll gain friends.  Don't be an a**hole.  That is always helpful.
replies.body_tagged: When I wasn't very popular in the community, I became a developer.  Instant friendship points.  But seriously, I'd just keep active and you'll gain friends.  Don't be an a**hole.  That is always helpful.

replies.body: To Be Popular, You Have To Earn Reputation. Don't Be Like Me, After Gaining My Popularity, It Just Went Poof Because I Broke too Many Rules.
replies.body_tagged: To Be Popular, You Have To Earn Reputation. Don't Be Like Me, After Gaining My Popularity, It Just Went Poof Because I Broke too Many Rules.

replies.body: My brother got "popular" and he was in with the cool kidz, so I went around saying "_garrett_rocks_ is my brother!!" and after alot of that, becoming good myself *cough* new cpu *cough*, I'm in with the cool kids now. :^)

replies.body:
Here are some ways that can help you get more friends! :D

- Be friendly
- Minimise the vulgarities or something like that
- Don't boast too much
- Get TeamSpeak :3

Hope it works! Have a good day. :)
replies.body_tagged:
